answers.answer: Hi there,These sensations experienced by you could be suggestive of some neuropathy. The common causes are diabetes (which causes progressive nerve damage), numerous medications, nutritional deficiencies (especially B vitamin deficiencies), and thyroid problems. Multiple sclerosis, pinched nerves, radiculopathy all can cause such symptoms. I will suggest you to get a neurological examination by your doctor. This is merely an advice and not a substitute for clinical examination Consult your doctor for more queries and assistance. Keep me posted.Best luck and take care!

question: I am 36 years old,I freqently experince a burning sensation inside my body,especially at my waist area(mostly from behind)and sometimes this and sometimes burning sensation moves to my chest area,other signs are,watery sperm Which I believe must have been as a result of the earlier mentioned and most times when I deficate my anus itches,pls can anyone help?cos i'ev seen several Doctors and they seem not to have a clue what the issue is,and i'ev used a couple of prescribed antibiotics but no possitive result.Pls can anybody body help?
title: Urgent Help Pleasseee!!!!
